CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 4-9 Typical BHJ devices comprise a phaseseparated donor / acceptor blend layer with low band gap conjugated polymers as the electron donor , and fullerene derivatives such as [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as the electron acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

Note: The mention of "low band gap conjugated polymers" does not specify a particular material name, but rather a class of materials with a specific property. Therefore, it is not included in the list of "Material Name" entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC61BM |
| PC71BM |

Paragraph: 4-9 Typical BHJ devices comprise a phaseseparated donor / acceptor blend layer with low band gap conjugated polymers as the electron donor , and fullerene derivatives such as [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC61BM ) or [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as the electron acceptor.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low band gap conjugated polymers |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) |
| [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

The two valid entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties are:

1. low band gap conjugated polymers
2. [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC61BM) and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) (these are two different materials with similar properties)
